muclient.script:
plugin_list = {} check_list = { {"3f498d929793c12cb70fb59e", "asciimap"}, {"b9315e040989d3f81f4328d6", "theme"}, {"b6eae87ccedd84f510b74714", "layout"}, {"c293f9e7f04dde889f65cb90", "mapper"}, {"b555825a4a5700c35fa80780", "channels"}, {"f178e68512c685b3be1e9b07", "group"}, {"3e7dedbe37e44942dd46d264", "gmcp"}, {"60840c9013c7cc57777ae0ac", "bigmap"}, {"e50b1d08a0cfc0ee9c44947b", "tick"}, {"23832d1089f727f5f34abad8", "soundpack"} }
function OnPluginInstall() check_plugins() end
function OnPluginListChanged() check_plugins() end -- function
function help(cmd,text) Note(" " .. cmd .. string.rep(" ",(24 - string.len(cmd))) .. text) end
function aard_help() Note("Global AardMUSH Commands
") help("resetaard","Reset miniwindows to their default positions") if isplugin("theme") then Note("
Theme Commands
") help("aard theme change","Change the current theme") end if isplugin("layout") then Note("
Layout Commands - For more info type 'aard help layout'
") help("aard layout (un)lock","(Un)Lock miniwindow positions") help("aard layout reset","Reset the layout (like resetaard but better)") end if isplugin("asciimap") then Note("
ASCII Mapper Commands
") help("maptype <0-6>","Change the ASCII map type (for more info type 'aard help maptype')") end if isplugin("mapper") then Note("
GMCP Mapper Commands - For more info type 'aard help mapper'
") help("mapper [show/hide]","Show/hide the GMCP mapper window") help("mapper [area/find] <t>","Search for a room matching <t> (use area for current zone)") help("mapper where <id>","Show directions to the room matching <room id>") help("mapper next","Go to the next room in the list") help("mapper resume","Resume going to the previous target room") end if isplugin("bigmap") then Note("
Bigmap Commands
") help("bigmap [on/off]","Show/hide the big (continent) map") help("bigmap (un)merge","(Un)Merge big (continent) map from/into GMCP mapper window") help("bigmap reset","Remove all cached maps (maps will require update)") help("bigmap update","Update the map for the current continent") end if isplugin("channels") then Note("
Communication Log Commands
") help("chats [show/hide]","Show/hide the communication log") end if isplugin("group") then Note("
Group Commands
") help("group[on/off]","Show/hide the group window") end if isplugin("tick") then Note("
Tick Commands
") help("aard tick","Show seconds until next tick") help("aard tick status","Put tick timer in the status bar") help("aard tick miniwin","Put tick timer in a miniwindow") end if isplugin("soundpack") then Note("
Soundpack Commands - For more info type 'aard help soundpack'
") help("spset <event>","Show info for the event matching <event>") help("sptog <ev|all>","Toggle all or the specified event on/off") help("spmute","Mute all event sounds") help("spvol <0-100>","Set global maximum volume for events") end
if isplugin("gmcp") then Note("
GMCP Commands
") help("gmcpdebug <0-2>","Set GMCP debugging verbosity") help("sendgmcp <str>","Send <str> to the MUD via GMCP") end end
function add_plugin(name) plugin_list[(#plugin_list+1)] = name end
function check_plugins() plugin_list = {} for i=1,#check_list do if IsPluginInstalled(check_list[i][1]) then add_plugin(check_list[i][2]) end end end
function isplugin(name) ret = false for i=1,#plugin_list do if plugin_list[i] == name then ret = true break end end return ret end
function getmemoryusage() collectgarbage('collect') return collectgarbage('count') end
